summary: This bill, the UProot Rioting International Students Engaged in Radical Subversion Act (UPRISERS Act), directs the Secretary of State to revoke the student visas of non-citizen students convicted of assaulting a police officer or offenses related to rioting. It also amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to make such individuals deportable. The bill focuses on offenses related to inciting, participating in, or aiding and abetting rioting, including acts of violence.
